original: Jorm, Arvid Kornelius, målare, Göteborg, f. 12/10/92 i Gbg. G. 37 m. Margit Kristina Falkman. — Stud. v. Gbgs musei rit- o. målarsk. 16-17 o. v. Astrid Holms målarsk. i Köpenhamn 17-19. Stud:res. t. Engl., Frankr., Ital., Tunisien, Algeriet, Tyskl., Holk o. Belg. 19-30. Repr. i Gogs konstmus., Gbgs kulturhist. mus., Gävle mus., Hudiksvalls mus. o. Sandvikens saml.
translated: Jorm, Arvid Kornelius, painter, Gothenburg, born on October 12, 1892 in Gothenburg. Married in 1937 to Margit Kristina Falkman. Studied at Gothenburg Museum School of Drawing and Painting from 1916 to 1917 and at Astrid Holm's School of Painting in Copenhagen from 1917 to 1919. Traveled to England, France, Italy, Tunisia, Algeria, Germany, Holland and Belgium from 1919 to 1930. His work is represented in the collections of Gothenburg Art Museum, Gothenburg Museum of Cultural History, Gävle Museum, Hudiksvalls Museum and Sandviken's Collection.

memberOf.name: Gothenburg Museum School of Drawing and Painting
